oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Henry Clay Treadway
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Henry Clay Treadway standing outside with hat in hand at Barwick Plantation, home of his older brother, Richard Caldwell Treadway, and nephew, Major Andrew Treadway. Henry Clay Treadway fought in the Battle of Gettysburg and was captured and taken prisoner.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
